{{cpp/container/mdspan/layout_left/mapping/title|operator()}}
{{cpp/container/mdspan/layout_left/mapping/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++23|
template&lt; class... Indices &gt;
constexpr index_type operator()( Indices... indices ) const noexcept;
}}
Maps the multidimensional index {{c|indices}} into an offset value.

Equivalent to {{c|return ((static_cast&lt;index_type&gt;(indices) * stride(P)) + ... + 0);}} where {{c|P}} is a pack such that {{c|std::is_same_v&lt;std::index_sequence_for&lt;Indices...&gt;, std::index_sequence&lt;P...&gt;&gt;}} is {{c|true}}.

{{cpp/enable_if|:
* {{c|1=sizeof...(Indices) == extents_type​::​rank()}} is {{c|true}},
* {{c|(std::is_convertible_v&lt;Indices, index_type&gt; &amp;&amp; ...)}} is {{c|true}}, and
* {{c|(std::is_nothrow_constructible_v&lt;index_type, Indices&gt; &amp;&amp; ...)}} is {{c|true}}.
}}
If {{box|{{c/core|extents_type​::}}{{lti|cpp/container/mdspan/extents/index-cast}}{{c/core|(i)}}}} is not a multidimensional index in {{c|extents()}}, the behavior is undefined.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|indices|the multidimensional index in the underlying extents object}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The offset value.
